subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: [RTSC] a copy of my final e-mail to Frank sumption I will go no  further!

Zack,
=A0
Statistically speaking "the paranormal field" has just as many as=
sholes as any other field. Unfortunately, the more people who include thems=
elves the more bubble-heads we get. Its just a fact of life. How we deal wi=
th it determines how we are viewed amongst our peers?
=A0
Frank R.

--- On =
Fri, 6/5/09, Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@...> wrote:


From: Zack Widup <w9=
sz.zack@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: [RTSC] a copy of my final e-mail =
to Frank sumption I will go no further!
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: F=
riday, June 5, 2009, 11:01 AM









I'd agree to that. He shares his res=
earch, never charges for anything, freely admits there are no "experts" in =
this field (he does not even consider=A0himself an=A0expert).

I grow more =
and more concerned about the hatred and viciousness I see from and among=A0=
some "paranormal researchers." It is not everybody by any means, but it=A0s=
eems to exceed the average amount of this=A0I see in other fields. I wonder=
 why this is? Is it perhaps in fact because everyone deep down inside knows=
 there are no experts in this field=A0and those who try to present themselv=
es as such know deep down inside they are presenting a false image?
=A0
Zac=
k

On Fri, Jun 5, 2009 at 10:42 AM, Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@ yahoo.com> w=
rote:













Arrogant!? Sumption? You have a warped view of Sumption =
if you see arrogance. He is in your face and speaks his mind but he has nev=
er claimed to be anything other than "the box" creator. Does he talk shit a=
bout people who claim to be experts? Hell yeah! That's one of the reason we=
 like him. 
=A0
Regards,
=A0
Frank R.
=A0
=A0

--- On Fri, 6/5/09, eamonn m=
gherbi <eamonnmgherbi@ yahoo.co. uk> wrote:


From: eamonn mgherbi <eamonnm=
gherbi@ yahoo.co. uk>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: [RTSC] a copy of my final =
e-mail to Frank sumption I will go no further!
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com=

Date: Friday, June 5, 2009, 4:58 AM







Hi All
=A0
I have to admit that=
 I share the same opinion as Bruce. I dont what everyones take is on this b=
ut I felt that some of moon and even Franks attitude was slightly arrogant.=
 I am a researcher in the UK using old reel to reel methods and obtaining e=
xcellent results. I lost some family and some close friends=A05 yeara ago=
=A0and suddenly it dawned on me...what is life all about. I went on to rese=
arch every evp pioneer i could, listen to hours/days of recordings and it c=
hanged my outlook on life. tears were turned to smiles and then I realised =
what all this research is for. it was a big step for me spiritually. 
=A0
I=
 dont know if there is anyone else on here using old fashioned methods but =
if anybody would like to hear recordings please ask. I am using a reel to r=
eel sony "Hi frequency" recorder and trying various types of tones, backgro=
unds e.t.c.
=A0
Good luck to everyone with their research, you are right we=
 are changing history we are discovering new things. if it wasnt for indivi=
duals such as raudive, jurghenson to name a few, maybe we wouldnt have disc=
overed this. it takes a brave individual to tackle an arrogant human race b=
lunted with science.
=A0
Kind Regards
=A0
The quiet one :-)






From: "Sn=
owfireL@aol. com" <SnowfireL@aol. com>
To: RTSC@yahoogroups. com; inside_th=
e_box_ rtsc_talk_ radio@yahoogroup s.com; EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 



Sent=
: Thursday, 4 June, 2009 20:25:26
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: [RTSC] a copy of m=
y final e-mail to Frank sumption I will go no further!







Sorry to hear=
 this Bruce, I=A0sure hope things get better, =A0I had no idea there were s=
o many problems when I joined all these lists, =A0I think you are all great=
 people, you folks together are making history don't you all realize this?=
=A0 There are so many people out there that have never heard of this type o=
f communication, thousands out there!=A0 My friend just lost her mother a c=
ouple of weeks ago, when I told her about the work you all are doing, tears=
 were replaced with a smile, she is looking forward to hearing from her mom=
 now too.=A0 Stop trying to hurt each other, it's not worth it, life is too=
 short for this stuff.=A0 You are all great people, May God Bless You All=
=A0~ And He Already Has,
sf
=A0

In a message dated 6/4/2009 2:27:06 P.M. E=
astern Daylight Time, balllan94@yahoo. com writes:






guys,

Sorry to bu=
rden you with this nonsense but this group and the RTSC group are my only v=
enues to respond to posts on other groups and have my account heard, I hope=
 you do not mind to much.

Here is a copy of my final personal e-mail to Fr=
ank Sumption which by the way is meant for him but he see's fit to post the=
m publicly in an attempt to discredit me.

I want you to read it first hand=
 so there are no chance of it being altered before it is posted else where.=


I will not address Frank again
------------ --------- --------- ---------=
 --------- --------- -

Frank,

This is getting ridiculous now, you should =
stop writing these posts, all you are doing is making yourself look ridicul=
ous.

I have offered many times to make my raw recordings available for rev=
iew by anyone who wants them. I have made the same challenge to your friend=
 moon who we all know is behind this tirade he has time and again refused o=
r ignored the request for any type of audio file
to be publicly posted for =
revue and continues to take advantage of innocent unsuspecting people with =
his con game and charging large amounts of money for sessions where he fabr=
icates and makes up content as he goes along.

I was the only one to confro=
nt him in public and expose him for the fake he is and this is his feeble a=
ttempt at retaliation. I and other researchers like me have brought this re=
search light years from where it was when you and I first met, moon just co=
ntinues to use it to rip people off and has not contributed a thing to the =
research of ghost box communication beside lining his own pockets. 

Just t=
he fact that he has you doing his dirty work shows the type of guy he is. I=
 can remember a time when you publicly came out against any type of money m=
aking using your boxes and even refused moon when he wanted to manufacture =
and sell them for large profits yet now you condone his robbery of innocent=
 unaware people and actually act foolish on his behest.

Frank you are bett=
er than this, just concentrate on developing a better box and forget about =
moon and his tricks and lies, he is finished in the paranormal and he knows=
 it, everyone is wise to his game and he is practically an outcast.

Frank =
you are hitching you wagon to a dead horse. Get away from these bad influen=
ces before they ruin your reputation as well.

We have had this moon discus=
sion in the past and once he has exhausted his need for you he will screw y=
ou again like he has done so many times before.

Frank, I like and respect =
you and I hope you will consider what I have said in this e-mail and I sinc=
erely hope you post this one on the evp-itc group. I will be posting it on =
my group and others I belong to.

Your former friend
Bruce

me Offers: Save big on popular laptops at Dell
